1311820.name: Evil Cult Soundtrack
1311820.description: This soundtrack includes all four hours of music that was used for the Evil Cult game. Composed by Jeremy Rice, this collection of ambient electronica is also available for download from Kahvi Netlabel old website. It is not available from the Jeremy's Bandcamp page due to the high-quality sources being lost. This soundtrack was made for the convenience of having these albums available for music lovers.
